ygData.msgSnippet: Hiding was fine. You could have posted a bit more about it, but how much you posted was fine. I can t believe I fell for almost the same trick twice (Vamprah

Hiding was fine. You could have posted a bit more about it, but how 
much you posted was fine. I can't believe I fell for almost the same 
trick twice (Vamprah pulled something like that on one of my chars 
before)!

::Havoc::

Havoc groans, remaining where he lay.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: Hoo boy, I hope that hiding like that wasnt cheap or breaking 
any
> rules. I sure enjoyed my first fight though. I have to go though 
see ya
> later.
> 
> BIC:
> "Yesssss" screams Scorponok from his hit. "That sure felt good" he 
finishes
> as he puts his cyber bee back on his claw. "Scorponok to Drill Bit, 
I am
> leaving the enemy to finish my mission. over" with that he 
transforms to
> beast mode heading towards the base.
> 
> OOC: Thanks, I might see you later tonigh.
